SA14n1181:3: sarvavastuparijñānaṃ vinā na mārgajñatāparijñānaṃ samyag iti sarvajñatāmāha-
SA14n1181:4: nāpare na pare tīre nāntarāle tayoḥ sthitā |
SA14n1181:6: iti | traiyadhvikadharmāṇāmanutpādākāreṇa tulyatāvabodhāt buddhabodhisattvānāṃ yā āsannībhūtā matā prajñāpāramitā,
SA14n1181:7: sā khalu prajñayā punarnāpare tīre saṃsāre,
SA14n1181:8: na pare tīre nirvāṇe ca yathākramaṃ śāśvatocchedalakṣaṇe,
SA14n1181:9: na tayormadhye'pi vyavasthiteti na saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ vyavasthitā |
SA14n1181:12: sarvajñatādhikārād vyatirekanirdeśena śrāvakādīnāṃ tryadhvasamatājñānābhāvāt samyak prajñāpāramitā dūrībhūteti |
SA14n1181:13: svādhigamamātrātmikā tu prajñāpāramitā kṛpāprajñāvaikalyānnirvāṇe saṃsāre cāvasthitā vastvastūpalambhatayeti jñeyā |
SA14n1181:14: 'yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā' iti nyāyādadhvatrayasamatājñānaṃ padārthāvabodha eva,
SA14n1181:15: nanu sa ca sarveṣāmeva samastīti kathaṃ śrāvakabodhisattvādīnāṃ samyak prajñāpāramitādūrībhāvaḥ,
SA14n1181:19: iti | māyākāranirmitavastunaḥ pratibhāse aviditatatsvarūpasya bhāvābhiniveśitā naiḥsvābhāvyāpratibhāsa iva kalyāṇamitrādyupāyakauśalavaikalyād vastu nimittayogena pratipattau tatsamatāparijñānamavijñātabhāvarūpāṇāṃ śrāvakādīnāṃ nāstītyatasteṣāṃ dūrībhāvo jinajananyā iti |
SA14n1181:20: bodhisattvānāṃ tu samārādhitakalyāṇamitropadeśatayā aviparītasatyadvayāśritaśrutādijñānotpattyupāyakauśalena ca utsāritabhāvābhiniveśabhrāntinimittānāṃ rūpādisarvadharmaparijñānameva tatsamatāparijñānamityatasteṣāṃ samyagāsannībhāvo'syā māturiti anupāyena eva dūratā,
SA14n1181:26: iti | sarveṣāṃ rūpādīnāṃ traiyadhvikānāñca dharmāṇāṃ sāsravānāsravobhayasthānīyānāmanupalambhasvarūpāṇāṃ sarvatra bhāvopalambhatayā te paraparikalpitātmādiśūnyatvena dṛṣṭāḥ |
SA14n1181:27: anuṣṭhānasaṃjñā tu eteṣāṃ pratipakṣabhūtāni viparyāsapravṛttatvena heyatvāt vipakṣo bhavati |
SA14n1181:32: iti | trimaṇḍalaviśuddhyā dānādāvanātmāvabodhena svaparayorniyojanaṃ samyak pravṛttatvāt sarvasaktinicayasthānapratiṣedhena copādeyatvāt sarvathā pratipakṣaḥ |
SA14n1181:33: tathāgatādiṣu namaskārādiḥ puṇyasambhārahetutvena pratipakṣo'pi san sūkṣmasaktirūpatayā na sarvathā pratipakṣa iti vipakṣo bhavati |
SA14n1181:36: iti | yasmāt svabhāvenaiva dharmagotrāṇāṃ śūnyatvāt teṣāṃ gāmbhīryam,
SA14n1181:40: iti | rūpādisarvadharmāṇāmekaiva prakṛtiḥ yaduta niḥsvabhāva iti jñānajñeyasamataikaparijñāne saktirvarjitā bhavati |
SA14n1181:43: iti | yasmāt sarvavijñānopalavdhārthanirākaraṇena tasyāḥ prakṛterdurbodhatā kathitā,
SA14n1181:50: evaṃ kṛtvā yathokto vai jñeyaḥ sarvajñatānate |
SA14n1181:52: iti | sarvajñatādhikāre yathoktanayena yathākramaṃ śrāvakabodhisattvādīnāṃ vipakṣapratipakṣayorayaṃ prabhedo'vasātavyaḥ |
SA14n1181:54: vipakṣādi evamabhidhāya tayorvibhāvanāyāṃ kaḥ prayoga iti cet prayogamāha-
SA14n1181:57: avikāro na karttā ca prayogo duṣkarastridhā |
SA14n1181:73: samatādvāreṇa prayogo bhāvanīya iti prayogānantaraṃ samatāmāha-
SA14n1181:77: prayogasamatāṃ pratividhya darśanamārgo bhāvanīya iti darśanamārgamāha-
SA14n1181:80: iti | pratisatyaṃ dharmajñānakṣāntirdharmajñānamanvayajñānakṣāntiranvayajñānamityevaṃ ṣoḍaśakṣaṇātmakaḥ sarvajñatādhikāre darśanamārgo bhavati |
SA14n1181:93: ātmānātmasvabhāvābhāvānnotpannaṃ na niruddhaṃ na saṃkliṣṭaṃ na vyavadātamityādayo duḥkhasatyākārā bhavanti |
SA14n1181:106: nairyāṇikānairyāṇikavikalpatvenobhaye vācyavācakabhāvalakṣaṇe jñeye śabde jñānasyānutpattiriti mārgasatyākārā bhavanti |
SA14n1181:107: evamete ākārāḥ sarvajñatākṣaṇā iti bodhisattvānāṃ darśamārgaḥ,
SA14n1181:109: śrāvakamārgo bodhisattvena parijñātavyo na sākṣātkaraṇīya iti bhāvanāmārgo na nirdiṣṭaḥ |
SA14n1181:111: iti seyaṃ punaḥ seyaṃ khalu punastridhā |
SA14n1181:115: iyaṃ sarvajñatā cetyevaṃ parivartatrayeṇa prakāratrayaṃ parisamāptam |
